name: ANDAGO INGENIERIA
tag_list: mhealth, ehealth, egoverment, public-administration, electronic-administration-software-solutions, open-source-solutions, telemedicine, telecare, telehealth, mobile-health-solutions
overview:
Ándago is a global innovation, solutions and services related to information technology in the field of Public Administration and Health . With a presence in Spain, Europe and America, Ándago has become one of the leading companies in the use of open source software since its founding in 1996. With an investment of € 18m in the last three years, is Ándago one of the first companies in its sector by national investment in R & D. Sales in 2010 amounted to 6.5 M € (about 9.45 million U.S. dollars) with a sustained growth of 23% over the past four years.

Ándago philosophy is to provide comprehensive services with high added value, based on professional experience and solutions acquired through participation in relevant projects and partnerships with leading companies. The strategic priorities are summarized as:

Innovation and R & D + i Using Open Source Technologies Unique projects Definition and development of both functional and technological solutions Collaboration in international projects of R & D + i and client through consortia and enterprise networks
